CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 29, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "Union - Management Cooperation Help Bring Integration - Edgar Rideout, the new driver-salesman for Rieck's had the help of his fellow union members and management as he began work last week. He worked with Melvin Pitler the first few days of his new assignment, learning the many things a retail salesman must know to keep a route running smoothly... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Edgar Rideout holding carrier with milk bottles, and Melvin Pitler pointing from Sealtest milk truck, with loading dock in background
